Key Match Events: Bryce Harper was 0-for-4 with a strikeout in a 4-2 Game 7 NLCS loss to the Arizona Diamondbacks.
Kevin Ginkel retired Bryce Harper in the seventh inning with Cristian Pache and Kyle Schwarber on base.
Post-Match Reflections: Bryce Harper expressed confidence that the Phillies will return to the postseason in 2024.
Harper highlighted the strong support from the Phillies' owner, president, and GM in their pursuit of a championship.
Harper acknowledged the disappointment of not closing out the series despite having a 2-0 lead against Arizona.
Harper expressed gratitude to the fan base for their support.
